== Main Inclusion Report for openal ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/o/openal, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Build-Depends of rss-glx
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=openal|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=openal|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box with no configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions.
** Package has been in Debian for quite some time (since at least oldstable)
** Active <nowiki>[[http://www.openal.org/|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No upstream bug tracker, but they seem to be discussing setting one up.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging, no patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All Build-Depends and Depends are in main.
